one.dialogue: HALT THIEF! You're under arrest for unlawful entry and theft!
one.response: Ouch those sirens and megaphones are sure going to take a toll on my lovely ears.

one.dialogue: OFFICERS! Don't let the thief get away!
one.response: Try not to hurt yourself, sweetie.

two.response: Are you talking about your heart?
